index_chat_text:
Chat with anyone online or leave just a shout!
All messages are also mailed to me.
contact_text: If you have anything in your mind, fill in the form and send your thoughts!
info_text:
Hello! I'm a Web-developer from Oulu who has an extensive experience in developing web-sites and web-apps with cutting-edge technologies. My main focus has been on the client side technologies (xHTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery) but I also have experience in back-end developing (Object-oriented PHP and MySQL).

My latest interest in the web-development world is Node.js which is a Javascript-runtime server environment for creating highly scalable web-server applications.

In fact this whole page you're looking at is running on a Node.js server using the Expressjs-framework. And the chat below is using Node.js-server and HTML5-standard's websockets for message broadcasting to other users. The messages are saved into MySQL database and the copies of the messages are also mailed to me.

When you log into the chat you can chat with other people who are in the chat at the moment and the messages will pop up instantly in everyone's browser. Test this for yourself by opening a second browser.
